attributes.action: that the royal prefix is given to woodon basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that the prime minister should grant and recommend to her majesty the prefix of royal be given to the name of wootton bassett. in recognition for the support that has been given by the people of wootton bassett, who have honoured with dignity and due reverence to the members of the armed forces who have returned after making the ultimate sacrifice for their county.

rejection.details:
You may wish to add your name to the existing petition:  

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/WoottonBassett/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
